What is the return policy?: You can return any product within 30 days of delivery for a full refund or replacement, provided it is in its original condition and packaging.
How do I start a return?: Log in to your account ➜ Orders ➜ Choose the item ➜ Click 'Return or Replace'. A prepaid label is generated instantly.
How do I track my order?: Open the Orders page or click the tracking link emailed to you after dispatch. Tracking updates refresh every 4 hours.
Which payment methods do you accept?: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, PayPal, Apple Pay and Google Pay.
Do you support cash on delivery?: Sorry, we currently do not offer cash on delivery. All payments must be completed online at checkout.
What is the smartphone warranty?: All smartphones come with a 1‑year manufacturer warranty covering hardware defects and battery issues.
Can I buy extended warranty?: Yes, you can add 1‑ or 2‑year extended coverage at checkout or within 30 days of purchase.
Do laptops ship with international charg: Yes. Every laptop includes a 100‑240 V compatible charger plus US, EU and UK plug adapters.
Are accessories covered by warranty?: All accessories (chargers, cables, cases, earbuds) carry a 6‑month limited warranty against manufacturing defects.
How long does shipping take?: Standard shipping is 3‑5 business days. Expedited options (1‑2 days) are available at checkout.
Do you ship internationally?: Currently we ship to the US, Canada, UK, Germany and Australia. Import duties are calculated during checkout.
Can I change my shipping address after o: If the order is not yet dispatched, you can edit the address under Orders ➜ Modify address. After dispatch, kindly contact support.
Is my data secure on your site?: Yes. We use TLS 1.3 encryption, PCI‑DSS compliant payment processors and never store complete card numbers.
What happens if my package is lost?: If tracking does not update for 7 days or shows 'lost', we issue a free replacement or full refund—your choice.
Do you price‑match competitors?: Yes, within 14 days of purchase. Submit a screenshot or link of the lower price and we’ll refund the difference.
